value.name: What we know about a shooting in Eden that left 2 Concho County sheriff deputies dead
value.description: Concho County sheriff's deputies Samuel Leonard and Stephen Jones were killed following a standoff in Eden Monday night, police say.

value.name: 2 Texas deputies killed, city worker wounded in attack
value.description: Two sheriff’s deputies have been killed in the central Texas town of Eden, an official with the state’s Department of Public Safety said Tuesday.

value.name: Police fired 24 shots at a handcuffed man. Why didn't they turn on their body cameras?
value.description: About 11:30 a.m., a responding on-duty police officer, Justin Baker, arrived at the Walmart parking lot. As he pulled up toward the front of the store, he heard a call of “shots fired” over the police radio, according to the state investigation.

value.name: Official: 2 sheriff’s deputies killed in central Texas town
value.description: Two sheriff's deputies have been killed in the central Texas town of Eden, an official with the state's Department of Public Safety said Tuesday. Trooper Justin Baker confirmed that the Concho County deputies died,
